entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h near the Strait of Georgia in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers early in the evening and 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h near the Strait of Georgia early in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023
